clinical_study.brief_title: Feasibility of the Management of Severe Cervical Dysplasia in a Single Visit
clinical_study.official_title: Single Visit Cervical Cancer Prevention Program

detailed_description.textblock: Women were recruited from underserved communities to participate in this single visit cervix cancer project. Large loop electrosurgical excision procedure (LEEP) was performed on SVP subjects with either a diagnosis of HGSIL/AGUS or suspicion of carcinoma. All other subjects with abnormal Papanicolaou smears were referred to our abnormal cytology clinics or received care in the community.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Older than 18 years
- No history of invasive cervical cancer
- Not pregnant
Exclusion Criteria:
- Absence of a cervix
- Abnormal vaginal bleeding
- Cervical cancer screening within the previous 12 months
- A known bleeding disorder
- Reluctance to be randomized
- Unwillingness to follow the study protocol
